hero.subtitle: We're on a mission to make world-class Korean healthcare accessible to everyone, everywhere.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To bridge the gap between international patients and Korea's world-renowned healthcare system, providing seamless, trustworthy, and affordable medical tourism experiences.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the global leader in medical tourism, setting the standard for patient care, transparency, and cross-cultural healthcare delivery.

values.title: What Drives Us
values.subtitle: Our core values guide everything we do, from patient care to partner relationships.

trust.title: Trust & Safety
trust.description: We only partner with JCI-accredited hospitals and verified medical professionals.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for the highest standards in every aspect of our service.

compassion.title: Compassion
compassion.description: We understand the vulnerability of medical travel and provide caring support.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We leverage AI and technology to enhance the patient experience.

founded.title: Company Founded
